questions.title: 闲人莫入。
questions.answer: No one but worker is admitted.

answer.en: I have not come into the garden.

title: ——不要那样做了，你的行为太极端了。
——我只能那样做。

answer.en: None of that！Your behavior is too extreme.
I can do nothing but that.

title: ——这儿严禁吸烟，否则你会被罚款！
——好，我马上把烟灭掉。

answer.en: No smoking here. Or you'll be fined.
Okay, I'll put my cigarette out at once.
